item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml Scotch
  • 30 ml Oloroso sherry
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with lemon twist.

item.title: Blood and sand
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20 ml Scotch
  • 20 ml blood orange juice
  • 20 ml sweet vermouth
  • 20 ml cherry liqueur
  • (garnish) orange zest
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Shake ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a flamed orange zest and cocktail cherry.

item.title: Scotch and soda
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml Scotch
  • 90 ml soda water

Instructions

Build in rocks glass over ice.
